Description:

In campaign "Hannibal at the Gates" players will find themselves in the Western Mediterranean before the Second Punic War. This campaign focuses on the period, which led to an all-consuming war between the two superpowers of the ancient world - Rome and Carthage. In the confrontation, which became one of the most famous conflicts in history, the clash between the two great geniuses tactical generals, two sworn enemies - Scipio and Hannibal. Will you be able to repeat their military successes or transcend them? How will you change the story? You can start a war for Carthage or Rome, to head the glorious Greek city of Syracuse or the first time in the game ROME II, to play for the Iberian nations arevakov or Lusitania.
